name: traceId
description: Unique identifier for tracing a contract flow end-to-end

name: contractId
description: The contract associated with the event

name: event
description: Describes the specific event that occurred

name: status
description: Status of the event, e.g., success, failure

name: message
description: Optional message or error related to the event

name: createdTimestamp
description: Timestamp of when the event occurred

name: functionName
description: Name of the Cloud Function or service emitting this log

name: chunkId
description: If applicable, ID of the chunk being processed

name: environment
description: The environment the event originated from (e.g., dev, prod)
